content: the most stretchy warm knit-look crochet piece i ve ever designed this beginner friendly crochet pattern makes the perfect ribbed toque the rylee beanie is very easy to work up and can be made in 7 different sizes from newborn baby through kids into adults add this classic knit look hat to your winter accessory collection or make as gifts for the whole family please note that this is an ad-free detailed pdf version of a pattern that can be found for free at www lakesideloops com/rylee **in an effort to make our pattern as convenient and easy to read as possible the pattern includes ** written pattern in english us terms pictures video tutorial left hand pattern available upon request *all patterns and photographs are the property of lakeside loops©* **all finished products from our patterns may be used for local sales and sold online ** thank you for looking kind wishes kimberley - lakeside loops www lakesideloops com
